item.title: Genetic Algorithm
item.description: What is the Genetic Algorithm? The genetic algorithm is a search heuristic that is used to find optimal or near-optimal solutions to problems that can be represented as a set of discrete values. This heuristic is often used in optimization and machine learning problems. The genetic algorithm works by creating a population of potential solutions and then iteratively improving the population by applying a set of operators, such as selection, crossover, and mutation.
